en.title: Read the co-respondent's response
en.youNeedToRead: You need to read the co-respondent's response before you continue. The response is legally known as the 'acknowledgement of service'
en.corespondentDidNotRespond: The co-respondent has not responded yet. You can choose to continue and apply for a decree nisi, or wait for their response.
en.theCoRespondentResponseToAdultery: The co-respondent's response to the adultery allegations
en.theCoRespondentResponseToAdulteryYes: The co-respondent admits to committing the adultery.
en.theCoRespondentResponseToAdulteryNo: The co-respondent does not admit to committing the adultery.
en.theCoRespondentDefendsTheDivorce: How the co-respondent wants to proceed
en.theCoRespondentDefendsTheDivorceYes: The co-respondent will try to prevent the divorce based on this application (they intend to 'defend' it).
en.theCoRespondentDefendsTheDivorceNo: The co-respondent will let the divorce proceed (doesn't intend to 'defend' it).
en.theCoRespondentAgreeToPayCostsYes: The co-respondent has agreed to pay some or all of the costs of the divorce.
en.theCoRespondentAgreeToPayCostsNo: The co-respondent has said they should not pay costs and given the following explanation about why they should not pay:
en.theCoRespondentWasAsked: The co-respondent was asked if they agreed to pay the costs that you claimed.
en.theCoRespondentGivenOptions: They were given the following options:
en.theCoRespondentAgreeToPaySome: to agree to pay some or all of the costs of the divorce
en.theCoRespondentNotAgreePay: to not agree to paying any of the costs
en.theCoRespondentGivenChanceToChanges: You'll be given a chance to change your mind about claiming costs later in the application. It is up to the court to decide how the costs will be split.

reviewAosCRResponse.title: The co-respondent's response
reviewAosCRResponse.no: The co-respondent does not dispute the allegations made in the application (they do not intend to defend).
reviewAosCRResponse.yes: The co-respondent disputes the allegations made in the application (they intend to defend).
